description:
A cop publishes a video online showing the masses that good cops like himself exist, but then he gets fired for speaking out, proving that there are no good cops. After watching his video you can clearly tell that cops are nothing more than the obedient servants of the politicians and they MUST follow their orders regardless of what these orders might be. It doesn't matter at all if you're a good guy if your job is to just follow orders. If cops are ordered to torture, they torture. If they're ordered to kill, they kill. If they're ordered to kidnap, they kidnap. If they're ordered to rape, they rape. And they'll do it all with pride and even demand respect for it. That's what the profession is all about. Following orders no matter what they may be. But if you think cops exist to serve you, the taxpayer, then you're a true idiot. Cops don't serve the taxpaying working class. They serve the political class that serves the banking class. It's the banks that puppeteer the cops who serve and protect the political class. It's always been the bank. It's time to wake up.
